fi.jumi.actors
Class SingleThreadedActors

java.lang.Object
  fi.jumi.actors.Actors
      fi.jumi.actors.SingleThreadedActors

@NotThreadSafe
public class SingleThreadedActors
extends Actors

Single-threaded actors container for testing. The ActorThreads are not backed by real threads - instead they will process messages when the processEventsUntilIdle() method is called.

Constructor Summary

          Returns an asynchronous Executor which works the same way as all the actors in this container.

SingleThreadedActors

Method Detail

processEventsUntilIdle

public void processEventsUntilIdle()
Processes in the current thread all messages which were sent to actors. The order of processing messages is deterministic. Will block until all messages have been processed and nobody is sending more messages.

When using CrashEarlyFailureHandler, will rethrow uncaught exceptions from actors to the caller of this method.

getExecutor

public Executor getExecutor()
Returns an asynchronous Executor which works the same way as all the actors in this container. Useful in tests to have asynchrony without the non-determinism of real threads.

See Also:
processEventsUntilIdle()
